title: Ceviche Tropical
description: Fresh flounder, cooked in lime with cucumber, red onion, mango, cilantro, avocado. Served with mayo-chipotle, and tostadas. Spicy upon request.

title: Chimichangas
description: Deep fried flour tortilla rolled up, filled with choice of shredded beef, chicken, or potato. Served with lettuce, pickled red onion, cilantro crema, green salsa, and lime.

title: Ensalada de Pollo
description: Grilled chicken salad with romaine lettuce, cucumber, corn, broccoli, carrot, cabbage, and avocado. Honey chipotle vinagrette.

title: Ensalada de Tijuana
description: Caesar salad, deep fried chicken milanesa, with parmesan cheese, romaine lettuce, caesar dressing and tortilla strips.

title: Fajita de la CASA
description: Steak, chicken and Shrimp in a special marinade with grilled onions, peppers and mushrooms. Served with rice, beans, and flour tortillas.

title: Flautas
description: Deep fried corn tortilla rolled up, filled with choice of shredded beef, chicken, or potato. Served with lettuce, pickled red onion, cilantro crema, green salsa and lime.

title: Fountain Drink
description: Coke, Diet coke, Sprite, Orange, Lemonade, Free Refill

title: Guacamole
description: Freshly made with avocado, tomato, cilantro, onion, and dash of lime.

title: Pescado Jalisco
description: Red snapper filet, cooked in a creamy tomato sauce with grilled onions, peppers, and mushrooms. Served with rice, beans, and flour tortillas.

title: Pescado Zarandeado
description: Fire grilled fish, smothered in a special marinade, served with rice, small salad and lime.

title: Pollo con Arroz
description: Grilled Chicken breast, served with rice.

title: Quesadillas
description: Two flour quesadillas, choice of beans, chicken or ground beef, served with rice

title: Queso Fundido
description: Melted cheese with chorizo, served with flour tortillas.

title: Tacos Para Ni√±os
description: Two soft corn tacos with choice of chicken or ground beef, lettuce, and cheese, served with rice.

title: Taquitos Del Mar
description: Marinated shrimp tacos in special sauce with melted cheese with lettuce and lime.
